unnormalised: Interesting article! I've been exploring Ayurveda myself. My aunt in Kerala swears by it, says her joint pain vanished after visiting an Ayurvedic centre near Kochi. Thinking of trying a panchakarma treatment myself. Heard good things about the one at Kottakkal Arya Vaidya Sala. Anyone else tried it? Planning a trip around Diwali (20/10/2024). Maybe around 10:00 AM on 21/10/24, I will call them. Cost seems to be around Rs. 15000 per week. Let me know your experiences! It's approximately 500 km from Bangalore.
